ComicInfo.Summary:
The Worry Bird: Ernie goes fishing and catches The Worry Bird, a telepathic depressed bird and the last of his kind.
The Battlin' American: The truth about the superhero the Battlin' American.
The Eatniks: Ernie is careless with his three wishes after a leprechaun gives him a magic coin.
Color Me Red, part one: Wayfaring Strangler: Red Hoerring wakes up from his recurring nightmare while in his hospital bed. He then gets a visit from Erskine Ford, a person he recalls as a serial killer.
Maiden Japan: Lloyd has a shock concerning his brother Doyle.
Uwanna: Ernie has to locate a female wrestling champion.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-30 11:59:38. [CVDB294584] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 23:25:45. [Issue ID 68715]
